plot: Jane, to the annoyance of the impatient police and hostility of the stubborn David Catcher, believes that his guilt is not of the murders... Her quest to determine his guilt sheds an uncomfortable light on his past.
title: The Warning: Monday 10am
plot_es: Jane, to the annoyance of the impatient police and hostility of the stubborn David Catcher, believes that his guilt is not of the murders... Her quest to determine his guilt sheds an uncomfortable light on his past.
